attributes.action: Stop the departure of Stay and Play &Toddler Fit at De Havilland Children Centre
attributes.additional_details: The De Havilland Centre is the most popular  venues for children's play with a garden and lots facilities for the children it is a concern that this will now be moved. The new venue has an outdoor space however doesn't have the toys that de Havilland offers. Also this venue is right in the middle of town making it harder for south hatfield and welham green families to attend if they do not drive.
attributes.background: The De Havilland Children Centre in Hatfield  is one of our most popular children centres in Hatfield. Due to a merge the children centre activities are stopping this coming October.
